bibl.author: Louisa Van Velsor Whitman
bibl.title: Louisa Van Velsor Whitman to Walt Whitman, 19 October [1869]
bibl.orgName: The Trent Collection of Whitmaniana, Duke University Rare Book, Manuscript, and Special Collections Library

revisionDesc.change: corrected mis-regularization of st. louis; changed transcription 'received' to 'receeved' and added choice encoding; added unclear to Louisa's 'deliru tremes'; removed unclear from 'prices'; remove space between 'L' and 'W' in closer

Review Proofreading Corrections and add annotations on letter date, Harper's Magazine, add RMB handnote; annotation on Mattie's return on Brooklyn, Walt's visit to New York, correct deficient Thayer note.
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.p:
i receevedreceived your letter to day with the money and harpers magsineHarper's Magazine i was glad to have the number and letter too i scarce ever see the magazine now adays but like to read it particularly at present for i have had such a sore thumb on my right hand i couldent couldn't hardly sew a stich i got a splenter splinter in it before the folks went away and then slopping about in cold water it got so bad i put slipery slipery elm on it but it dident didn't doo do much good but it has got so i can use it to day i was so disappointed last saturday Saturday in Georges not coming home i wanted him to come very much to fix the stove for one thing but Edd and i got it up yesterday i thought we could hardly get it out but we did and its much better it has been quite cold here i got a bushel of coal this morning and it works much better than wood) i havent haven't heard from st louis St. Louis since i last wrote to you walterWalter i dont don't know whether mattyMatty is coming on here this fall or not i dont don't think it would be good for her i think its it's too late in the season but if they come we will doo do the best we can) not one of the prices has been here since you went away you know helen was here just before you left and i said i thought she hadent hadn't a very good time
i sent a letter to hannaHannah last week a good long letter urging her as much as i thought would doo do to come and mak make us a good vesit visit that i particularly wanted her to come and that she must write to me as soon as she received my letter without fail and i suppose that will be the last of it i put one dollar in the letter and said i send a little change but will send more next time whether she ever gets any of the letters i dont don't know) i have had thoughts of sending a line to Dr thayerThayer what doo do you think of it walterWalter doo do you think it would be best or not) maryMary wanted me very much to go to BurlngBurlington and she would stay and keep eddEdd i told her i dident didn't feel able to undergo the journey) you know maryMary wrote that Ansel they thought failed the business was while they were down in virginia Virginia he got a drinking and John Louisa s Louisa's husband got very much put out with him and throwed his liquor overboard and they came home anselAnsel come near dying with the deliru tremesdelirium tremes he was master mason in his lodge but is broke and gone down to a common man maryMary and louisaLouisa belongs to the presbeteranPresbyterian church but the change of heart we wont won't say any thing about she says she is as good as the rest and have a 20 dol dollars pew and with

closer.salute: Love to all of the OconorsO'Connors

postscript.p: sorry to hear her sister is ill
